content: असक्त {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not excessively attached, not feeling interested in, indifferent (to); असक्तः सुखमन्वभूत् <ls>R. 1. 21.</ls> {@--2@} Not entangled; <ls>Ś. 2. 12.</ls> {@--3@} Not united, detached. {@--4@} Not attached to worldly feelings and connections. --क्तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Without being excessively attached or addicted to; <ls>Ki. 1. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Without any hindrance, quickly; <ls>Dk. 35.</ls> {@--3@} Incessantly, ceaselessly; <ls>Ki. 4. 31.</ls>
